data.name: RPGScenery - Dark Wood Scene
data.detailed_description:
Between the intertwined trees of the dark forest runs a narrow path bound on all sides by prickly, entangled bushes. The trail winds through a swamp of uncertain depth, giant cobwebs which span between trees and bushes, before finally ending at a tent camp. The place looks eerie and who knows what kind of creatures have choosen this place as their home.

This DLC contains 6 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
